original_text: Blessed is he that readeth, and they that hear the words of this prophecy, and keep those things which are written therein: for the time is at hand.
korean_text: 이 예언의 말씀을 읽는 자와 듣는 자와 그 가운데에 기록한 것을 지키는 자는 복이 있나니 때가 가까움이라

sentences.korean_translation: 이 책을 읽는 자는 복이 있고

sentences.original_text: and they that hear the words of this prophecy
and keep those things which are written therein
for the time is at hand
